about.content_1: Dealing with various and complex challenges, transition actors can sometimes feel stuck in intractable issues. With Playwithtransitions, AFD offers to facilitate their decision-making, in a creative and funny way. Far from giving ready-made solutions, this site offers to ask the right questions so that the solution comes from itself.
about.content_2: This game is inspired by the principle of 'lateral thinking' theorized by Edward de Bono, which promotes innovation by getting out of the usual thinking pattern, and 'oblique strategies', a card game imagined by Brian Eno and Peter Schmidt, two artists wondering about ways to get around the blockages that can be encountered in a creative process.
about.content_3: The principle is simple: a card will appear at random, follow the advice written on it and apply it to your problem. Leave your rational mind aside, and let your mind wandering. You can change the question by swiping the card on the side of your screen and deepen all concepts and methodologies by clicking on 'learn more'. Do not hesitate to share this site if it helped you!
